uBlock Origin MV3

An unofficial port of uBlock Origin to Manifest V3, enabling webRequestBlocking with policy installation or --allowlisted-extension-id. This website currently hosts version __CRX3_VERSION__ of uBlock Origin. You can view the update.xml for the direct download link.

You can use prebuilt versions of this port by adding "__CRX3_ID__;https://__PAGES_URL__/update.xml" to your ExtensionInstallForcelist policy.

  • Linux:
    1. Create /etc/opt/chrome/policies/managed/policy.json or /etc/chromium/policies/managed/policy.json.
    2. Write { "ExtensionInstallForcelist": ["__CRX3_ID__;https://__PAGES_URL__/update.xml"] } into the file.
  • Windows:
    1. Open regedit, create the key Software\Policies\Google\Chrome\ExtensionInstallForcelist.
    2. Add a string value named 1 (if it already exists choose the next available number).
    3. Set it to __CRX3_ID__;https://__PAGES_URL__/update.xml
  • macOS: no clue
Make sure to enable Allow User Scripts in the extension details after it gets force-installed.

Check out the GitHub if you want to install it by sideloading and using --allowlisted-extension-id.
